summary: Hello all! I have provided a text file & video that walks you through step-by-step of how to merge Skyrim mods. I have also made a video to accompany this. The video will be available in the description as well as the 'Videos' section.
descriptionHtml:
[center][center][font=Georgia][color=#ffff00][b][size=6]Merge Skyrim Mods
[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/62059-0-1432100048.png[/img]


[/b][/color][/font][/center][/center][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Hello all! I have provided a text file and video that walks you through step-by-step on how to merge Skyrim mods.[/font] 

[/size][center][size=4]
[/size][youtube]rIa8dJhPRxo[/youtube][/center]



[size=4]



[center][youtube]uzRLq4gAu6U[/youtube][/center]
[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4] *This isn't my video, but I originally learnt how to merge mods from it. All credit goes to PlagueHush![/size][/font]



[center][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/62059-0-1432100048.png[/img][/center]

[color=#ffff00][font=Georgia][size=5][b] Things you will need:[/b][/size][/font][/color]
[b]
[/b][size=4][b] *TES5EDIT -[/b] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?[/size]

[size=4][b] *Merge Plugins xEdit Script -[/b] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/?[/size]

[size=4][b] *7-Zip -[/b] http://download.cnet.com/7-Zip/3000-2250_4-10045185.html 

[/size]
[size=4]
[center][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/62059-0-1432100048.png[/img][/center]
[/size]

[left][b][color=#00b050][size=5][font=Georgia] Reasons to merge mods include:[/font][/size][/color][/b][/left]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4] *You have a large load order[/size]
[size=4] *You use heaps of mods[/size]
[size=4] *Overall neatness (in Skyrim's Data folder, your load order, plugins list & NMMs/MOs modlist).[/size]
[/font][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] *Ease of use (to sort similar/corresponding mods into one file).[/font]

[/size]

[left][font=Georgia][color=#c00000][size=5][b] Reasons not to merge mods include:[/b][/size][/color][/font][/left]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4] *A mod that requires several compatibility patches (If you merge a mod & its' patches, the patches won't be able to load in the correct load order as the files are all-in-one). #NOTE# I'm not sure for certain if this is even  an issue. I'm just using common sense as I haven't tested this yet. [/size]
[size=4] *You have a small-medium load order [/size]
[size=4] *You don't use many mods.[/size]
[size=4] *You couldn't be bothered


[font=Garamond][size=6][color=#4bacc6]*[url=http://zyliceliddell.weebly.com/#/]Visit Website For All Of My Mods & Resources![/url][/color][/size][/font][/size][/font]
author: Zylice

files.name: How To Merge Skyrim Mods - V1.1
